titleStmt.title: Verses on the siege of Glocester, and Col. Massey.

notesStmt.note: At foot of page: Printed according to order.
First line of text: So stands a rock (rooted within the main).
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 25 1645 printed by me Geo: Thomason to Give away to my noble Countreyman major Gen: Masses' [sic] friends".
Thomason copy bound with items from January 1646.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
